WorkItem.Description:
Cannot reference a PCL dll that uses MVVM Light PCL from a WPF application that also uses MVVM Light PCL. Problem lies in the using GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command;
If no RelayCommands exist in PCL project reference works ok, else I get this message 
Error	22	The type or namespace name 'ModuleA' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?)

I m using  GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command Version v4.0.30319
NUget package Portable.MvvmLightLibs 4.1.27.6 (both projects PCL & WPF)
WorkItem.Summary: Cant Reference PCL Project With MVVM Light Portable from WPF project

Comments.Message:
I cannot reproduce this. If you still have the issue, please let me know.

Thanks
Laurent
